    @allure.story("ФИО")
    @allure.title("ФИО — невалидные значения по аналитике → 400")
    @pytest.mark.parametrize("field,bad", [
        ("firstName", _invalid_names()["short_1_char"]),
        ("lastName", _invalid_names()["non_cyrillic"]),
        ("patronymic", _invalid_names()["leading_dash"]),
        ("firstName", _invalid_names()["trailing_apostrophe"]),
        ("lastName", _invalid_names()["double_space"]),
        ("patronymic", _invalid_names()["double_dash"]),
        ("firstName", _invalid_names()["only_punct"]),
        ("lastName", _invalid_names()["too_long_21"]),
    ])
    def test_full_create_bad_fio(self, api, x_guid_and_birth, field, bad):
        x_guid, birth = x_guid_and_birth
        payload = _base_payload(birth)
        payload[field] = bad
        attach_pretty_json({field: bad}, "ФИО (невалидное)")
        resp = api.full_create_user(x_guid, payload)
        attach_pretty_json(resp.json(), "Ответ full/create по ФИО")
